1.name: Willow
1.description: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

2.name: Die Hard
2.description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

3.name: Beetlejuice
3.description: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

4.name: Coming to America
4.description: An African prince travels to America to find a suitable woman to marry.

5.name: Rain Man
5.description: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

6.name: Heathers
6.description: In order to get out of the snobby clique that is destroying her good-girl reputation, an intelligent teen teams up with a dark sociopath in a plot to kill the cool kids.

7.name: Big
7.description: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

8.name: Mystic Pizza
8.description: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

9.name: Bloodsport
9.description: Follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

10.name: Dangerous Liaisons
10.description: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

11.name: Akira
11.description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two teenagers and a group of psychics can stop.

12.name: Mississippi Burning
12.description: Two F.B.I. Agents, with wildly different styles, arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

13.name: Hotaru no haka
13.description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

14.name: Child's Play
14.description: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

15.name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
15.description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

16.name: They Live
16.description: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that allow him to wake up to the fact that aliens have taken over the Earth.

17.name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
17.description: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

18.name: Tonari no Totoro
18.description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

19.name: Twins
19.description: A physically perfect but innocent man goes in search of his long-lost twin brother, who is short, a womanizer, and small-time crook.

20.name: A Fish Called Wanda
20.description: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

21.name: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
21.description: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

22.name: Working Girl
22.description: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss' job.

23.name: Cocoon: The Return
23.description: The old age pensioners that left at the end of the first film come back to Earth to visit their relatives. Will they all decide to go back to the planet where no one grows old, or will they be tempted to stay back on Earth?

24.name: Bull Durham
24.description: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

25.name: Cocktail
25.description: A talented New York City bartender takes a job at a bar in Jamaica and falls in love.

26.name: The Land Before Time
26.description: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

27.name: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
27.description: In 1968, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

28.name: Young Guns
28.description: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

29.name: Rambo III
29.description: Rambo mounts a one-man mission to rescue his friend Colonel Trautman from the clutches of the formidable invading Soviet forces in Afghanistan.

30.name: Two Moon Junction
30.description: A young Southern débutante temporarily abandons her posh lifestyle and upcoming, semi-arranged marriage to have a lustful and erotic fling with a rugged drifter who works at a local carnival.

31.name: The Accused
31.description: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

32.name: Hairspray
32.description: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

33.name: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
33.description: Two con men try to settle their rivalry by betting on who can swindle a young American heiress out of $50,000 first.

34.name: The Blob
34.description: Remake of the 1958 sci-fi horror classic about a deadly blob from another planet which consumes everything in its path. Teenagers attempt without success to warn the townspeople, who refuse to take them seriously.

35.name: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
35.description: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences with his band of misfits.

36.name: Red Heat
36.description: A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.

37.name: The Last Temptation of Christ
37.description: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

38.name: Brain Damage
38.description: One morning, a young man wakes to find that a small, disgusting creature has attached itself to the base of his brain stem. The creature gives him a euphoric state of happiness but demands human victims in return.

39.name: Midnight Run
39.description: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

40.name: Above the Law
40.description: A former Special Operations Vietnam vet works as a Chicago cop, and uncovers C.I.A. wrongdoing.

41.name: Mac and Me
41.description: An alien trying to escape from NASA is befriended by a wheelchair-bound boy.

42.name: Colors
42.description: An experienced cop and his rookie partner patrol the streets of East Los Angeles while trying to keep the gang violence under control.

43.name: Stand and Deliver
43.description: The story of Jaime Escalante, a high school teacher who successfully inspired his dropout prone students to learn calculus.

44.name: She's Having a Baby
44.description: Young newlyweds find out just how unprepared they are for their future together.

45.name: Scrooged
45.description: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

46.name: Le grand bleu
46.description: The rivalry between Enzo and Jacques, two childhood friends and now world-renowned free divers, becomes a beautiful and perilous journey into oneself and the unknown.

47.name: The Dead Pool
47.description: Dirty Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.

48.name: Oliver & Company
48.description: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York City.

49.name: The Great Outdoors
49.description: A Chicago man's hope for a peaceful family vacation in the woods is shattered when the annoying in-laws drop in.

50.name: Earth Girls Are Easy
50.description: A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.
